cause.description:
gemma sadly spilt from her boyfriend, RIP Mr. Bettis a month or so ago, and dispite many a flirtation with other men since, she still feels a little man hungry.
As her significant other, i feel we must act to rectify this bleak situation, before gemma experiences a sex/man famine.
Please pledge your bodies and leagence to this very worthwhile cause.
1. gemma must get man offers of love
cause.name: gemma needs a man
